:py:mod:`~farabio.models.detection.yolov3.yolo_trainer` Module
=========================================================================

.. image:: ../imgs/yolov3.png
   :width: 600

:py:class:`~.YoloTrainer` class uses YOLO: Real-Time Object Detection model,
which is originally proposed in this `arXiv`_. However implemented trainer module refers to `Yolo-v3`_ and
uses this `Git`_ code as reference work.

************
References
************

.. target-notes::

.. _`arXiv`: https://arxiv.org/abs/1506.02640
.. _`Yolo-v3`: https://arxiv.org/abs/1804.02767
.. _`Git`: https://github.com/eriklindernoren/PyTorch-YOLOv3

:py:class:`~.YoloTrainer` class
-----------------------------------------

.. autoclass:: farabio.models.detection.yolov3.yolo_trainer.YoloTrainer
   :members:
